About Our Organization

Leading Environmental Innovation Since 2008

Gehn Eco Services Inc. is a pioneering women-led social enterprise that has been at the forefront of environmental sustainability and waste management innovation for over 15 years. Our mission is to transform communities through sustainable environmental practices while creating meaningful livelihood opportunities.

Meet Our TeamView Our Impact

Women-Led Innovation

Empowering communities through environmental leadership

15+
Years of Excellence
5000+
Lives Impacted
50+
Communities Served
100%
Women-Led

Our Mission

To transform waste management practices and create sustainable livelihoods through innovative environmental solutions, empowering communities and protecting our planet for future generations.

Implement comprehensive waste value chain management systems

Create economic opportunities through environmental initiatives

Build resilient communities through education and capacity building

Our Vision

To be the leading women-led environmental organization in Africa, pioneering sustainable waste management solutions and creating circular economies that benefit both people and planet.

Zero waste communities across Africa

Women empowerment through environmental leadership

Sustainable economic models for environmental protection

Our Journey

From humble beginnings to becoming a leading environmental organization, our journey has been marked by innovation, community impact, and sustainable growth.

2009

Foundation

Gehn Eco Services Inc. was founded as a women-led social enterprise focused on environmental sustainability.

Started with 5 team members
2012

First Major Project

Successfully implemented waste management system in Victoria Island, Lagos.

Served 10,000+ households
2015

Expansion

Extended services to multiple communities across Nigeria, establishing regional offices.

Expanded to 5 states
2018

Innovation Award

Received national recognition for innovative waste-to-wealth programs.

National Environmental Award
2021

Digital Transformation

Launched digital platforms for waste tracking and community engagement.

50+ communities served
2024

Global Recognition

Recognized as a leading environmental organization in Africa.

15+ years of impact

Our Core Values

These fundamental principles guide our work and shape our relationships with communities, partners, and the environment.

Sustainability

We are committed to environmental stewardship and creating lasting positive impact.

Integrity

We operate with transparency, honesty, and accountability in all our endeavors.

Community

We prioritize community needs and empower local stakeholders in our solutions.

Innovation

We embrace creative solutions and cutting-edge technology to solve environmental challenges.

Our Commitment

As a women-led organization, we are committed to breaking barriers and creating opportunities for women in environmental leadership. We believe that sustainable development requires diverse perspectives and inclusive solutions that benefit all members of society.

Awards & Recognition

Our commitment to environmental sustainability and community empowerment has been recognized through numerous awards and accolades.

2023

National Environmental Excellence Award

Federal Ministry of Environment

Recognition for outstanding contribution to environmental sustainability in Nigeria.

2022

Women in Leadership Award

African Women in Business

Honored for pioneering women-led environmental initiatives in Africa.

2021

Innovation in Waste Management

Lagos State Government

Awarded for innovative waste-to-wealth programs in Lagos communities.

2020

Community Impact Award

NGO Network Nigeria

Recognition for significant positive impact on local communities.

2019

Sustainable Development Champion

United Nations Development Programme

Awarded for contributions to achieving SDG goals in Nigeria.

2018

Environmental Stewardship Award

Environmental Protection Agency

Recognition for excellence in environmental protection and conservation.

Our Impact Continues

These awards represent not just recognition of our past achievements, but also our ongoing commitment to environmental sustainability, community empowerment, and women leadership in Africa.
